column2: Pasting mvn dependency with classifier to gradle

column3: Gradle supports maven classifiers https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/dependency_management.html#sub:classifiers. This change adds support for classifiers in PasteMvnDependencyPreProcessor.
What do you think about this change? Is there anything missing?

Sorry for the delay, the change looks good to me. I've merged it.
Thanks for the contribution!
